title: PDF Is unuseable because of a box that appears on the right side of PDF. The box contains an animation of a highlighter continually highlighting a representation fo text. How do I make this box go away so I can read the PDF?
content: Hi. I like using Firefox, But when I open a PDF or download a document for PDF reading I continually encounter a problem which seriously interferes with reading the document with the PDF. The Problem is this - PDF Is unusable because of a box that appears on the right side of PDF. The box contains an animation of a highlighter continually highlighting a representation of text. How do I make this box go away and stay away so I can read the PDF? Thank you for any help you can provide to solve this issue. Sincerely W.
creator: wayneolson54

Thank you .

title: Loading issue with certain web pages
content:
Certain webpages (which load without problem in Opera) will fully load and then immediately become blank as if it never loaded. If I hit "reload" the same thing happens, it loads and then goes blank. This is only certain webpages but here is one for example:

https://newrepublic.com/post/193132/white-house-leavitt-deny-war-plans-group-chat

Again, this is not a problem in Opera. But Firefox has been my main browser for many years now, and I'd rather not switch if I don't have to.

Thank you. Malcolm Garris

title: Habilitar Plugin Java
content:
Boa Noite Estou tentando habilitar o Plugin Java no navegador Mozila para acessar os tribunais para consultas. Inicialmente fiz o seguinte procedimento:

Para habilitar o plugin Java no Firefox, pode seguir os seguintes passos: 

   Abri o Firefox    Selecionei a aba para acessar as "Ferramentas" e selecionar Complementos   Só que não achei a aba "Ferramentas" e consequentemente não encontrei a aba Complementos. Estou fazendo alguma coisa errada? Pode me ajudar?

Obrigado

Carlos O. Schneider Rio Grande do Sul - Brasil
creator: anabdireitobr
